DOC.brief_summary: To test the safety, effectiveness of MK0217 when taken once a week for six months in treating patients with Paget's bone disease.
DOC.brief_title: A Research Study to Test the Effectiveness of MK0217 in Patients With Paget's Bone Disease (0217-206)(COMPLETED)
DOC.criteria: Male or female, ages 18 to 90 years with a diagnosis of Paget's bone disease Patient cannot stand or sit upright for at least 30 minutes Patient has difficulty swallowing or problems with digestive system
